sentences.english: His step-mother is nice to him.
The stepmother took her two lazy daughters to the party.
sentences.chinese: 後媽帶着兩個懶惰的女兒去參加舞會了。

sentences.english: I'm trying to win over a little girl who clearly doesn't want a new mother.
sentences.chinese: 我正在嘗試贏得一個擺明不想要後媽的小女孩的心。

sentences.english: Bree: When I was young, my stepmother told me that I very lucky.
sentences.chinese: 在我小的時候我的後媽說我很幸運。

sentences.english: Mother died, and her father married a stepmother.
sentences.chinese: 母親去世了，夫親又給她娶了一個後媽。

sentences.english: My stepmother served salmon for dinner. I'm severely allergic to seafood.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯的時候後媽給上的三文魚，而我喫海產品過敏。

sentences.english: Her stepmother and sisters are bad to her.
sentences.chinese: 後媽和姐姐對辛黛瑞拉不好。

sentences.english: Cinderella is forced by her bitchy stepmother to clean the house from stem to stern every day.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘被她惡毒的後媽逼得天天從頭到尾的打掃屋子。

sentences.english: Today, my psycho stepmother and I got into an argument, and she started to get physical.
sentences.chinese: 今天我那個有點神經的後媽和我吵了起來，還動手。

sentences.english: Today, to be nice, I baked cookies for my step-mom as a birthday present.
sentences.chinese: 今天我好心給後媽烤餅乾作爲生日禮物。

sentences.english: The step-mother of Snow White is wrong.
sentences.chinese: 白雪公主的後媽錯了，爲什麼呢？

sentences.english: Fortune to one is mother, to another is stepmother.
sentences.chinese: 命運對有些人如同親孃，對另外一些人就是後媽。

definition: (metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
lit. twice every three days (idiom); practically every day/frequently
to follow bad examples/to be corrupted by bad examples
to shout and scream (idiom); to kick up a fuss/to make a scene
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
to forget favors and violate justice (idiom); ingratitude to a friend/to kick a benefactor in the teeth
